column7: Discussions, reviews, and appraisal of special topics in microbiology and molecular biology; seminar or lecture. Topics vary. 1 graduate hour. No professional credit. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
column9: 1 graduate hour. No professional credit. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated to a maximum of 2 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
column11: Restricted to students enrolled in the Microbiology graduate curriculum.
